document.body:
Welcome to: Cooking Games Club Cooking Games for girls , played and added daily by our team ! Have fun playing our cooking games for free . Cooking Games Burger Games Cake Games Dress Up Games Food Games Girls Games Ice Cream Pancakes Games Pizza Games Restaurant Serving Games
A Universe of its own, BSG online
Latest cooking games trends:
waitress pinky s pancakes sara cooking class omg pizza lol cook cooking new pizza cook real cooking rainbow pizza deco penguin serving job games olives mus lily and tody s bistro
Waitress Games
Gorgeous Waitress To earn big tips as a waitress the way you look counts a great deal. So today you will create the perfect look for a waitress. Choose the hair style, the makeup, the colors and the clothes. Try different combinations till you’re pleased with the result. ...
Ninas Pizza Restaurant If you want to run a successful restaurant it’s essential to provide excellent customer care. Nina has great expectations from you and she wants you to keep all customers happy. Move fast to serve the food, and the exact order to each customer, or they will get tired of waiting and leave....
Japanese Resto You were hired at the newest Japanese Resto and your goal is to become a five star waitress. So you will have to lead the customers to their table, take their orders and serve them, then don’t forget to clean the table to take the money. Raise enough many to accomplish the target set for the day and you will receive a star. ...
Fast Food Resto This is a new challenge for you, waitress in a fast-food restaurant. Greet the customers, take their orders and give them to the chef, then place the food to the right customer. Prove in 5 days you are a 5 star waitress. Once the meal is finished collect the money and clean the table so it can be ready for the next customers. Gain enough money to advance to the next level....
Drive In Restaurant You are a waitress at the Drive In restaurant and you have to serve food to hungry clients. Collect their order, get it to the cooker and then bring it back to the client....
Mayhem Restaurant In this game you can choose your character , a waiter or a waitress and you have to serve food for restaurant's clients. Do it in a short period of time so you can earn big tips....
Dinner Restaurant At our dinner restaurant you will serve one of the most delicious dinner you ever served. We try to make your visit to our restaurant an experience you will never forget. Cooking delicious and tasty food for our clients , we can make them feel in heaven....
